mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board( title, subTitle, content, boardType, created_date, user_id ) VALUES( #{title}, #{subTitle}, #{content}, #{boardType}, now(), #{user_id} )
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET title = #{title}, subTitle = #{subTitle}, content = #{content}, boardType = #{boardType}, updated_date = now(), user_id = #{user_id} WHERE idx = #{idx}
